merge_before_transcript:
monica: I am good. I finished my book.
rachel: Oh yeah, what’s it about?
monica: I don’t remember. Do you wanna take a walk?
rachel: Yeah, I do. (they both run out)
ross_transcript: Dear Mary-Angela. Hi. How’s it going. This is the hardest letter I’ve ever had to write. (to Chandler) What the hell’s a matter with you? How do you think Joey’s going to react when he finds out that you blew off his sister with a letter?
